documents.document:
Taking your Property Mortgage Consultant careers with Proper

Property Buyer Singapore is seeking for old staff of banking and lending or financing institutions to work as part time accredited mortgage consultant. The web site of Property Buyer is PropertyBuyer.com <http://www.PropertyBuyer.com.Sg>. The selection and recruitment is quite difficult for people who do not deal with potential buyers the honest way. Paul Ho, the manager of the organization, stated that this time, they would want to be aggressive on hiring and recruiting individuals for the accredited mortgage consultant placement.

The Property Buyer Singapore property buyer for real estate in Singapore helps choose real property deals and home loans with acheaper but fair bank rate for interest. “It would be a bit difficult to recruit for the right people. You need to know the real intentions behind the resumes, the faces, and the imagination of these property buyer mortgage consultants.” Said Mr. Ho. “The only matter that we seek and want to maintain in our organization is our integrity so customers would be feel confident in sending business to us or personally perform business with us and our representative or accredited mortgage consultant.

There are four factors that the Property Buyer Singapore company is looking among the job seekers during the meeting before choosing them for the job position. They would want to determine that the job applicants illustrate these attributes before they approve them for training. The job applicants must have the right amount of passion, insight about the real estate market, knowledge of the building, practical knowledge about matching preferences with wanted properties and assets, and the right mix of integrity and empathy in delivering the preferences of the customers. The firm prefers job applicants to keep their reputation as trusted mortgage consultants who do not sell more than the value of the property.

The Property Buyer Singapore offers real estate properties and helps mortgage loan processing of interested customers with banks. “We give our best to give customers the real estate property that best matches their preferences but we do not charge more to facilitate the mortgage loan.” Mr. Ho stated in a straightforward manner.

The Property Buyer Singapore helps men and women seeking for a good and appropriate place to live, compare prices and balance the dangers of funding with their economic and lifestyle profiles. The company performs a good search on customers’ property preferences including the financing institution for a low interest mortgage loan. The basic function of the company is to fit the economic profile of the consumer with the property or home qualities and loan mortgage offer.

Start with your Property Buyer Mortgage Consultant Career at

Do you have a passion for selling real estate properties? Do you have a working experience with banking or financing institutions? If all your answer to the questions is yes, we would be willing to review your resume.

We only want applicants for the position who are without a job in compliance to the new property agency legislation. Here at Property Buyer Mortgage Consultants, we search for agents with the right attitude for the job. If you are persistent and decided to attain a lot of money, then please keep on to browse through about our principles.

The principles of the Singapore property buyer mortgage consultants

Integrity

Like other agents, the agents striving with their property buyer mortgage consultant career aim to generate much sale and money. However, we presume that sales should come as something that compensates efforts for delivering excellent and honest assistance to potential consumers. With integrity, this would mean having to charge clients a fair market value and operations cost.

Passion

In a property buyer mortgage consultant career, you acquire your reputation as an honest agent when you work with integrity. There will be weeks when income will be scarce or deals would be a bit slow. This scenario might make you think of cheating and deceiving others just to generate extra cash. Hanging on to your integrity because you like what you do and you love your potential buyers would keep those loan and real estate inquiries pouring in. This is passion.

Empathy

Empathy is the art of putting yourself in the shoes of your consumers. If your potential customers seem to struggle making a decision, pay attention and offer them numerous alternatives. Do not offer advice, instead present them a viewpoint of the benefits and consequence involve in buying the property. Comprehend and feel how they wanted to take the property they desire. Meet their financial resources with the available properties in the market.

Knowledge

The accredited mortgage consultants working it Singapore need to have a bit of knowledge about mortgage loans and property trends. If you are thinking of having a property buyer mortgage consultant career in our organization, you need to have to disclose data based on facts that could be easily understood by the consumer.

Property Buyer Mortgage Consultant’s principles

The four principles of passion, integrity, knowledge, and empathy are the elements of a good enterprise. You may be prosperous over charging one deal of a client but would fail to obtain recommendations from them or even repeat purchases.

Property Buyer Mortgage Consultant vs. Other Careers

In a property buyer mortgage consultant career, your importance grows as you acquire more knowledge and reputation in the market. More people will demand for your service and the chain of testimonials would keep increasing. We hire and sustain only honest and committed accredited mortgage consultants who could demonstrate integrity, knowledge, passion, and empathy.

Singapore Property Consumer and Investor Viewpoint for July

The market dramatically raised from June to September 2009. In a matter of three months, the industry costs for property in Singapore crazily went up. The price of the landed property showed about 175.0 while the prices for the non-landed properties increased to the level of 174.5 during the first quarter of 2010 (URA price index 1st Quarter 2010). The increased of the landed property was 8.3% throughout the last quarter of 2009 and the initial quarter of 2010. Throughout this time period, the prices of the condominiums also rose to additional 5.7%.

Nowadays, the Aspen Heights properties already demonstrated a large $1,600 psf hits at the same time the Leonie Studios showed an interesting increase of hits from $1,600 to a $1,700 psf. The other business sectors also showed major raised of hits like the $2,100 of the 76 Shenton, the $1,730 psf of the Waterfall Garden, and the Cyan for $2,400 psf. The company Ardmore Park reached to $2,500 psf while the Admore II company had about $3,000 psf hits. There are also loads of the developments that are in the mass market type such as the waterina that went to as high as $1,000 psf from the previous $900. The mass market condos areeasily approaching to the hits level of at least $1,000 psf. Yet another mass market company which is the Atrium Residences, which is fast closing in on to $800 psf hits from the previous $700 psf hits.

Effects on Share market

Though the share market was to some extent sluggish previous year, it restored about 3,000 points on the Straits Times index. The share market commonly leads the property market by about 3 to 6 months. The only thing that can make guessing the share market development hard is when there is an undersupply of HDB flats. The activity of HDB flats straightaway affects price worth. Any low supply of HDB flats affects the price increases. At this time, HBD flats demonstrated an undersupply trend, which makes guessing of the share market a little bit difficult.

The firms with overseas investors regardless of the industry were the least disturbed in Singapore during the 2008 and 2009 recession in terms of retrenchment and lost of jobs than the local companies (Ministry of Manpower). The flow of foreign investment recovered quickly when the expatriates returned and carried on their business operations in Singapore. The restoration of jobs paved way to the recovery of corporations in the sectors of apartment rentals, property rentals, and the middle to high-end property market prices.

Advance Your Property Buyer Mortgage Consultant Career with

Property Buyer Singapore is trying to find for individuals who can work as accredited mortgage consultant part time. They are inviting people who worked before as lending or bank staff to visit the organization's web site PropertyBuyer.com.Sg. Paul Ho, the manager, expressed that they have just developed their selecting and recruiting processes for accredited mortgage consultant more intense. Hence, interested applicants who are not used to working with consumers in all honesty will certainly have difficulty getting the position of the accredited mortgage consultant.

The Property Buyer Singapore is a service provider engaged in buying real estate. It has been facilitating property or home transactions and home loans with a lower and affordable lending interest rate. As stated by Mr. Ho, hiring candidates is not as difficult as they will need to look through the diplomas, physical appearance, and opinions of the job candidates trying to find a property buyer mortgage consultant career. The company searches for people who are able to keep up the company's integrity so that customers and prospects will feel at ease requesting for professional mortgage services with their representative or accredited mortgage consultant.

The corporation Property Buyer Singapore specifies four distinctive components from the job candidates during the occupation interview before they can proceed to the next phase for testing. They at least would want to know if the applicants have these features before continuing training. The applicants need to have adequate passion; knowledge regarding the market, property, and how to match preferences with properties; as well as the right mix of integrity and empathy in supporting clients needs. The organization wants all job applicants to look after their reputation as dependable mortgage agent with dependable accredited mortgage consultants who present properties and assets at realistic property value.

The practice of Property Buyer Singapore is to market properties and assets and facilitate personal loan applications of potential clients with banks. Mr. Ho explained that the corporation will always try to give consumers the best package for the kind of property and location they want. The buyers will be provided a list of the real estate along with the home mortgage loans plan that best fits their requirements. However, they get the job done this as an supplementary service and do not demand additional charges for processing mortgage loans.

The Property Buyer Singapore would be very pleased to offer persons looking for eye-catching and convenient place to live. They could help out the potential clients compare costs and weigh financial risks. The corporation determines the home and property choices of the buyers as well as the lending institution in order to provide lesser rates of interest. The corporation fits the customer's financial profile and standard of living with the attributes of the real estate and loan offer.

High End Luxury Market Property outlook

There is a chance that the luxury market will become softer in the near future. The authorities could be expressing its worry on the downward trend of the high-end luxury market demand simply because the government was quite fast in sending out press releases that the high-end luxury market prices in Singapore are still a bit lower than the prices in Tokyo, Hong Kong, London, New York, and Paris. Certainly, they made a research and compared the per square feet rates (psf) of the high-end luxury properties between nations.

The expatriates residing on in the country of Singapore have been demonstrating keen interests on the high-end luxury properties market. This probable experienced expatriates market for properties belonging to the high-end market are comprised of rich expatriates who are dealing in land and home properties to aid their business accommodations and travel in the Singapore region.

The usually classified places as as the country of Singapore high-end luxury properties the following:
• Ardmore Park
• Grange Road
• Leonie Hill
• Oxley Road
• Patterson Road
• Botanica Garden Area
• St. Martin
• Balmoral
• Marina Bay
• Sentosa Cove

The new game players to the high-end luxury markets are the areas of the Sentosa and Marina Bay. The rest of the places are the regular District 9, 10, and 11 areas. In the seaside regions, you can still have a high-end luxury property like the Shenton Way and the Keppel Road. Even though several are promoting as belonging or providing high-end luxury properties, not all regions actually have the features befitting that of a properties belonging to the high-end catrgory. This implies that prospective customers of the luxury properties belonging to the high-end category need to understand the characteristics attributed to a high-end luxury property in the community they are planning to buy and at find some more information about the person or company selling the property. It would be wise to know and identify the properties that already classified and accepted as belonging to the property category of the high-end.

High price volatility labeled super high-end Luxury properties

Perfect timing is crucial when you plan to buy real property or other assets. The distinction of the rates could range from $2,500 to as high as $4,000 psf. Rich people keeping about $5 to $10 million of net assets may find that timing is necessary when investing in real estate super high-end luxury properties. However, for people with about $20 to $100 million worth of net assets, they really wouldn’t care much about timing regardless of the purpose of the purchase. They still hold significant holding power over their investments.

Property Buyer Singapore features reliable mortgage consulta

Property Buyer Singapore looks for enthusiastic former bank and lending employees who are interested to get the job done as one of their part-time accredited mortgage consultants . The company is looking for men and women who desire to nurture with their property buyer mortgage consultant career in Singapore. The corporation is striving to augment its income by hiring accredited mortgage consultants who have the proper amount of knowledge and passion about the real estate market and helping the customers with their mortgage loans.

Paul, the manager of the Property Buyer Company, said, “We are looking for individuals who hold the correct blend of integrity, empathy, knowledge, and passion. We desire to retain the quality of our accredited mortgage consultants representing our business. The enterprise does not allow hidden charges in aiding mortgage loans and paying for the properties. We anticipate that our workers, the accredited mortgage consultants think the same.” Paul personally trains the mortgage agents in the company.

The four elements of integrity, passion, empathy, and knowledge detailed well the traits of the organization's office employees as well as their property agents. The enterprise is searching to hire individuals who possess the passion to market for not only revenue but also have the right level of drive and desire to provide what the clients plan to accomplish when they decide to select an accredited mortgage consultant. The organizations mission is to promote at fair real estate market value that could meet up with the presumptions and the economic profile of the prospects. The accredited mortgage consultant should be honest not to create additional hidden charges and subject the potential clients to additional service fees in facilitating their property finance loan applications.

Paul said that the usual question he gives to candidates in their first interview is, “Do you like to generate cash?”. This question could be tricky. However, job applicants would like to gain money but precisely how they choose to bring in cash and just how they provide their solutions in building through marketing our products is vital. “This is the stage that most applicants fail in the interview. The firm wants honest mortgage agents who could control themselves from acting to bill more than the company charges. We surely like to keep up our reputation as a organisation represented by reputable honest accredited mortgage consultants.

Property Buyer Singapore is a Research-focused mortgage consultancy organization that aids examine Singapore Home loans regardless if it is for new dwelling loans or Singapore Mortgage remortgage home loans. The enterprise functions to help customers compliment their financial profile with the property attributes and home loan mortgage offer. For interested job candidates, further information is available in their web site, Property Buyer Singapore.

Shape your profession as property mortgage consultant

Property Buyer Singapore is searching for individuals with past banking, financing, or lending work experience. If you truly believe, you have what it calls for to help out Property Buyer Singapore improve with you along with it, click www.PropertyBUYER.com.Sg and look for the web page for the job applicants. Property Buyer Singapore is needing part-time accredited mortgage consultants to assist with their rising amount of potential customers. Enjoy a gratifying property buyer mortgage consultant career with Property Buyer Singapore.

Property Buyer Singapore CEO Paul Ho states this time around they wish to be more invasive in the hiring as well s recruitment of accredited mortgage consultants who really wish to prosper with their property buyer mortgage consultant career with the company. The Ceo of Property Buyer Singapore pointed out that job candidates who are not used to performing honest deals may have difficult time to pass the traditional test for the work as an accredited mortgage consultant, because the position has a very unique criteria .

“It is always very hard to look for and employ the service of the best suited applicants with the ideal knowledge, passion, and empathy for the position,” Paul pointed out. “There is the distinction of recognizing through the objectives of these applicants beyond the diplomas, words, and smiles. The job applicants wishing to succeed their property buyer mortgage consultant career with us may mean differently from what they say. Honesty is really necessary in this profession.”

The four important traits and skills Property Buyer Singapore considers when interviewing applicants who intend a property buyer mortgage consultant career with the organization are:

• Passion
• Integrity
• Market and property know-how
• Consumer empathy

“The one thing our organization tries to keep is our reputable name for integrity to try to make prospective buyers comfortable in personally dealing with us or providing referrals for business with us or through our corporation representatives and house consultants.”, Paul says.

Property Buyer Singapore hopes to maintain the fair dealing and reliable company mortgage agents' reputation. Property Buyer Singapore facilitates property deals and low-interest home loans with banks to help potential clients reach their desires of having a better home with the kind of lifestyle they envision they would need. Property Buyer Singapore will search for loans with low interest or similar interest rates on specific properties’ mortgage loans that would match clients’ property preferences. The organization has been sustaining a very reputable name in the real estate industry and assisting of home finance loan applications.

Enjoy doing the job as an accredited mortgage consultant in

The organization of Property Buyer Singapore is in search for job applicants with past banking experience to become one of their trusted part time accredited mortgage consultants . The company needs honest job candidates for the accredited mortgage consultant position. The Property Buyer Singapore seeks for even one trusted but knowledgeable job applicant who aspires to develop property buyer mortgage consultant career with the organization. The firm is conservative in going for job applicants. The Property Buyer Singapore searches for for people who could provide impressive economically inclined attitude and understanding on real-estate latest market trends.

Paul Ho, the Chief executive officer of Property Buyer Singapore stated, “We are not looking to hire an army of agents who intend to work for cash but we are attempting to create a a team of reliable consultants who could maintain the integrity of the company.” Smilingly, he added, “If you need a wonderful place to call home, you can request Property Buyer Singapore to guide you get it. Our data base has many properties available that could support your financial and lifestyle status. We help assess prices and balance the risks of mortgage loan using our financing formula for risk evaluation.” The Ceo makes sure that clients will receive the right guidelines employing the business firm's representative who had been reliable with their property buyer mortgage consultant career.

A property buyer mortgage consultant career is a very critical job function where only the most committed and knowledgeable individuals thrive. It is a work that offers contentment and happiness to other people and facilitates customers’ goals of owning a place they dream. It’s not just skills that is important in this occupation but the right perspective and behavior towards life because you are trying to deliver happiness and achievement to individuals trying to get the kind of life they want to live.

“We plan to bring potential customers happiness by offering the right condominium and the right spot they prefer,” says Paul. “But what distinguishes us from most business companies in the same field is that our service fees for aiding mortgage loans are very affordable, no hidden extra fees, no additional cost, and we are very clear in conveying the real property condition and terms of the mortgage contract.”

The Property Buyer Singapore helps property or home deals and mortgage loans of attracted buyers using the basic method of thinking over probable income possibilities against the interest rate, monthly premiums, and other needed measures related in buying real-estate with the help of accredited mortgage consultants.

Property Buyer Singapore Company offers reliable mortgage co

Property Buyer Singapore is offering former lending instutions employees to work for them as part time accredited mortgage consultants . The firm strives to grow their product sales by employing consultants who are more passionate and knowledgeable about real estate condition and taking care of real estate loans. The corporation requests candidates who are wanting to improve their property buyer mortgage consultant career as an accredited mortgage consultant of Property Buyer Singapore.

“Prospects want brokers who have the knowledge to help them in buying their wanted property. As a Research Focused enterprise, our brokers should not create addtional charges on the statement of account about the sector but rather have the transparency to maintain the company’s integrity. This would certainly suggest that our accredited mortgage consultant should know how to evaluate real estate values and assess interest rates of lending companies.” said Paul Ho, the Chief executive officer of the Property Buyer Singapore firm. Paul revealed that as a general rule, an accredited mortgage consultant should be fair and transparent enough to render the assistance that the customer asks from the firm.

An accredited mortgage consultant of the Property Buyer Singapore follows a scheme that sustains the firm's reliability. The business is searching for individuals who could exhibit the aspects of integrity, passion, empathy, and knowledge. To get by rivalry, the corporation intends to deliver services for property search and mortgage loan facilitation services in a very transparent method. The organization does not approve of accredited mortgage consultants making additional fees for the services involved.

Paul stated, “The Property Buyer Singapore business likes to retain its long-built reliability as we are seen as trustworthy knowledgeable agents in real estate consultancy. So, our real estate brokers should have the four values of integrity, passion, empathy, and knowledge, which are the fundamental values that the company follows in dealing with clients. This is the hidden-secret of expanding your property buyer mortgage consultant career with us – integrity, always integrity.”

The company is searching for property brokers who could exhibit the right mix of integrity and empathy in supplying outstanding customer service by complementing their preferences and monetary profiles without creating additional charges during mortgage loan facilitation. The real estate property search and buy company is located in Singapore. It is a research focused property buying company that also facilitates home loans applications. For interested job applicants, extra particulars is available in their web site, The company works by matching available real estate asset, desired property, and financial profile of the prospects.

High-End Market versus the Mass Market

High-priced facilities such as the access to port, lobbies with private lifts, golf clubs, swimming pools, and private lift lobbies could add to the value of the high-end property. Very high price sealings, security services, and proximity to the schools for the expatriates are the widespread offerings provided by properties belonging to the high-end categories focusing on the international buyers. Foreign buyers would feel more attracted and pleased if the residential rights and immigration policies shaped to their needs are quite lax and not strict. This will also add to the interest for high-end properties on a certain place. The tallest, highest, most luxurious, and various other superlatives features make these properties belonging to the high-end category as one of the best places to live globally.

An improvement of the properties belonging to the high-end category costs would impact and generate an improvement for the real estate properties that are categorized as blow the high-end properties category. This pattern may tremendously affect all other related sectors of the country. If the market for the high-end properties price tag improves were highly selective, then maybe it would not affect the whole country. This predicament may end to an increasing gap of the mass market and the high-end luxury market prices. The local consumers and the high-end market real estate properties have totally different components and presented amenities. The marketed characteristics and amenities contributed to the big difference of their prevailing market prices.

A slight increase of the high-end properties prices would also influence and develop an enlargement for the real estate below the high-end properties. This trend may greatly change the other related industries of the country. If the market price for the high-end properties increases were selective, then maybe it would not affect the whole country. This setting may result to an increasing gap of the mass market and the high-end luxury market prices. The mass population and the properties belonging to the high-end have totally different characteristics and offered conveniences. The offered characteristics and comforts contributed to the big difference of their current market prices.

The properties belonging to the category of the mass market are more affordable and a bit cheaper than those properties belonging to the high-end market. Mass market properties could devise more demand because of its affordability. It also highly supports the general income conditions. The high-end market cannot be as flexible as the mass market in terms of costing because it has its own set of attributes and high-end services that the mass market properties do not have (Source: Singapore Ministry of Manpower, aggregated from Central Provident Fund board). Mass market could easily create a demand than the high-end market.

Increase of Super High-End Properties for Luxury produce hea

Mid-end luxury markets are properties that are usually located in the outer central region. They are usually based on the exterior of the boundary of the District 9, 10, or 11. The existing cost of the luxury properties for the mid-end ranges from $1,100 to $1,500 psf. Even so, it would be complicated for this market group to go further than the $1,600 price level with the ceiling prices that Shento and Leonie Studio companies are providing. Leonie Studio ceiling price lies within $1,700 to $1,800 while the company of Shenton ceiling price lies within $1,800 to $2,000. Taking into consideration the ceiling prices inequality and the property classification, the mid-end luxury market could not achieve a cost that will go beyond the $1,600. The price level could come to $1,300 and $1,400 for market on mid-end luxury. The mass market condominiums are advertising at an average price range of $1,000 to $1,100 psf for over 99 years with real estate properties at non-traditional areas.

Holding power of buyers

The unemployment rate in Singapore country is about 2.2% in March 2010 (source: Ministry of Manpower). The HDB supply physical shortage is could be quite difficult to balance when the Singapore government is issuing lands. The country is still experiencing shortage of HDB supply. The abrupt downwards spiraling of costs may not affect the buyers as long asprivate housing buyers provide reasonable prices and do not overbid. The best approach is for the property buyers to bid within the median of the property prices in Singapore to be strongly competitive. Though this may not apply to highly priced improvements or constructions that show more heavier swings, this is good enough to keep up with the competition in cases of low HDB supply.

HIGH END MARKET versus Mass Market

The high-end market could still retain a low HDB supply scenario with the potential to appreciate its value including the properties located near the location of the high-end property. They would elevate too whenever the high-end properties near their location raise their market value. Properties with characteristics related to the best locations across the globe will have a price benchmark equivalent or very much the same to the internationally known best properties in other known locations. Distinctive attributes such as the Yacht Berthing, sea view, special butler service, near to exclusive resorts, within town and financial centers, centers of entertainment or other activities could help increase the worth of the property.

Housing and equity in Singapore

The monthly average income of individuals in the country of Singapore is $4,000 in 2010. Last 2008, the average earnings was about $3,977 per person. Last year, the average earnings per particular person was $3,872. Supposing that both spouses are holding a job in a certain family unit, the average earnings would be an estimated $8,000 per family. Looking at the following household features:

• average husband and wife family cash flow of $8000 (with no present debts)
• 30 years housing loan tenor
• ratio for debt servicing of 50%
• interest rates set at 2%

The estimated greatest real estate property price that a family unit or a couple could have the funds for is about $1.082m. This would mean that the average household in Singapore could very well pay for a real estate property valued at $1.35m. Even so, like most loan accounts or borrowings, there is the problem on raising a part of the equity to serve as down payment. The best tactic is to find the lowest interest rate among the aggressive banks in Singapore offering this kind of products.

The rate of interest setting among conservative banks in Singapore is typically at the level of 3.75%. This lessens the loan borrowings to about $863,000 loan size. The computation of the salary and the rates of interest data for loan borrowings demonstrates the average household in the country of Singapore could only pay worth $1.08m of real estate property.

Rich business men and ministers contributed to the rise of the salary levels. This movement lead to a big gap among the highest and lowest salaries, which generated the mean salaries of the nation a little lower. In 2009, the average household earnings was $4,850 as stated by the Singstat (Singstat, http://www.singstat.gov.sg/news/news/op19022010.pdf ). If the median incomes were sorted by type of property, the ultimate result would be a household income of $12,500 for private flats, private residences, and condominiums (Singstat, http://www.singstat.gov.sg/news/news/op19022010.pdf)

The computation for the mean household income in Singapore country is as follows:

Average income per person as of 2010 = $4,000
No. of persons in a household = 2 (couple)
Average household pay = 2 x average income per person
Average household pay = 2 x $4,000
Average household pay = $8,000 as of June 15, 2010

The final result provides us an idea on the existence of significant difference in earnings within Singapore. Most private condominium owners have a household earnings of $12,500. If we lower the prices for private condominium to the average household income of the Singapore population, which is $8,000, this would create a difference scenario for the real estate industry.
